Commands.Blizzard ROK: 1-HIT AoE magic BRV attack  Turns to 「Blizzara ROK」 while 「Charge & Dodge」 is active
Commands.Blizzara ROK: 1-HIT AoE magic BRV attack  Low Action Delay
Commands.Triple Slip: Raises BRV by 0.8 of Initial BRV  Grants 「Charge & Dodge」 for 4 turns   「Charge & Dodge」 raises Evasion Rate and lowers Action Delay
Commands.Blizzard Shot: 2-HIT Ice magic BRV+HP attack.  Moderately raises Evasion Rate for 2 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Blizzard ROK Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Blizzard ROK ,  Blizzara ROK
Passives.Triple Slip BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Triple Slip
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Triple Slip Dodge Up: Slightly raises Evasion Rate while  Charge & Dodge  is active
Passives.Symbol of Bravery: Counters avoided enemy attacks with a BRV attack
Passives.Triple Slip Boost: Greatly raises Max BRV while  Charge & Dodge  is active
Passives.Blizzard ROK Extend: Blizzard ROK  use +2When using  Blizzard ROK ,  Blizzara ROK :- Slightly raises BRV potencyAfter using  Blizzara ROK :- Triggers a single target HP attack
Passives.Focus Attack: Raises BRV damage dealt to a single target with AoE attacks by 1.6
Passives.Triple Slip Extend: Triple Slip  use +1When using  Triple Slip :- Greatly raises the BRV Gain based on Initial BRV- Marginally improves Action Delay effect of  Charge & Dodge Slightly improves Evasion Rate effect of  Charge & Dodge When using  Charged Shot :- Greatly raises BRV potency- Slightly lowers Action Delay
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises Initial BRV and Max BRV by 20%.
Passives.Blizzard Shot Extend: When using  Blizzard Shot , adds the following effect:- Grants  Ice Enchant

Weapons.Rune Trigger CP: 35: When using  Triple Slip :- Raises the BRV gain based on Initial BRV- Improves the effects of  Charge & Dodge  and extends its duration- Grants  Small Attack Up  for 8 turns
Weapons.Magicite Pistol CP: 15: When using  Blizzard ROK ,  Blizzara ROK :- Raises BRV potency
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Blizzard Shot  use +1Duration of  Blizzard Shot  effects +2 turns
